1. Introduction
 1.1. These Terms of Service govern your use of the "Ahoy" application provided by Ahoy, and any related services.
 1.2. By accessing or using the App, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use the App.
 
 2. Description of the App
 2.1. The App allows users to add their own events or announcements to the map, as described above.
 2.2. Users are prohibited from providing location information that does not exist or is not the actual address of a business.
 2.3. Content shared through the App should not include any profanity or offensive language.
 2.4. Please note that the duration of events is counted from the current time, and an event may not appear in the App if it has not been approved by a moderator. The moderator's working hours are not extended beyond regular business hours (Polish time).
 
 3. User Conduct
 3.1. You agree to use the App only for lawful purposes and in a manner that respects the rights of others.
 3.2. You are solely responsible for the accuracy and authenticity of the information you provide, including location details.
 3.3. You agree not to engage in any of the following prohibited activities:
 a) Submitting false or misleading information, including fake or non-existent locations.
 b) Uploading, transmitting, or sharing any content that contains offensive, obscene, or inappropriate language.
 c) Violating any applicable laws or regulations while using the App.
 
 4. Content Moderation
 4.1. The App may employ moderators to review and approve user-submitted events and announcements.
 4.2. Due to the moderation process, there may be a delay in the appearance of events or announcements within the App.
 4.3. The moderators' working hours align with regular business hours (Polish time), and events submitted outside of these hours may experience delays in approval.
 
 5. Intellectual Property
 5.1. The App and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by Ahoy and are protected by international copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, and other intellectual property or proprietary rights laws.
 5.2. You may not modify, reproduce, distribute, create derivative works or adaptations of, publicly display, or in any way exploit any of the content or intellectual property found in the App without the prior written consent of Ahoy.
 
 6. Privacy
 6.1. Ahoy respects your privacy and handles your personal information in accordance with its Privacy Policy. By using the App, you consent to the collection, storage, and use of your information as described in the Privacy Policy.
 
 7.Limitation of Liability
 7.1. To the fullest extent permitted by applicable law, Ahoy shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of profits or revenues, whether incurred directly or indirectly, or any loss of data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from your access to or use of the App.
 
 8. Termination
 8.1. Ahoy may terminate or suspend your access to the App immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach these Terms of Service.
 8.2. Upon termination, your right to use the App will cease immediately.
 
 9. Miscellaneous
 9.1. These Terms of Service constitute the entire agreement between you and Ahoy regarding the use of the App and supersede any prior agreements.
 9.2. These Terms of Service shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Poland.
 9.3. Any disputes arising out of or in connection with these Terms of Service shall be resolved by the courts located in Polish Jurisdiction.

Come to event to see more information

By using the application, you agree to the following terms and conditions: 
 1. Information 
 1.1 Ahoy enables the addition of events and announcements by companies and organizations, as well as their display and participation by users. 
 1.2 Events and announcements are categorized into two types: 
 
 Promotional (companies can announce specific promotions of any kind at a particular location, targeting Ahoy users). 
 Social (organizers announce events of a certain nature at a specific time and place, bringing people together, e.g., festivals, protests, etc.). 
 1.3 Users can accumulate points (2 for joining any event, 1 for viewing daily advertisements) and compete with each other in rankings. These points CURRENTLY do not yield any benefits; they are solely for entertainment purposes. 
 1.4 Events are visible to all within a 20-kilometer radius, while announcements are visible to all individuals from the country chosen by the organizer. 
 1.5 To establish a business account (an account with the ability to add events and announcements), the application's registration form must be completed. Submissions are manually reviewed by the application's supervisory team (Point 3).
 1.6 The terms and conditions may be changed at any time. 
 
 2. Rules for Adding Events and Announcements 
 2.1 Events and announcements fall into two categories: 
 Promotional (companies can announce specific promotions of any kind at a particular location, targeting Ahoy users). 
 Social (organizers announce events of a certain nature at a specific time and place, bringing people together, e.g., festivals, protests, etc.). 
 2.2 Organizers MUST provide accurate information in the submission form. 
 2.3 If an event/announcement ends sooner than the date provided in the form, it must be manually removed in the "Manage" window. 
 2.4 Always remember that an event/announcement will only be visible in the country entered in the form. For instance, if the address is in Poland but the organizer selects a different country, the event will not be visible in Poland. 
 2.5 Each organizer can add only one event/announcement of each type.
 2.6 Each request to add an event/announcement is manually verified by the Ahoy supervisory team (Point 3). 
 
 3. Submissions 
 3.1 All submissions are accepted/rejected at the discretion of Ahoy moderators. 
 3.2 Submissions for creating business accounts should include detailed information about how and why the applicant intends to use the application. 
 3.3 Submissions for events/announcements must contain accurate information. 
 3.4 The duration of an event/announcement is counted from the moment the submission is sent to Ahoy. Please note that an event/announcement might be added to Ahoy later than when the submission was made due to this. 
 3.5 An event/announcement becomes active immediately upon approval by moderators and remains active until the's specified deadline. Organizers can also manually remove their event/announcement before the deadline. 
 3.6 The waiting time for submission approval is unknown and depends on the volume of submissions and the time of submission. 
 3.7 Moderators review submissions during typical working hours in Poland. Submissions might not be reviewed during weekends and late Polish hours. Moderators may voluntarily review submissions during weekends and late hours, but this is not a rule and depends solely on their discretion. 
 
 4. Credits 
 4.1 All graphic work (backgrounds, icons) was created by: Traffka 
 4.2 The entire application was conceived and developed by: Damek34 
 
 5. Ownership 
 5.1 All graphics, icons, and application logic are original, and their use for personal purposes is prohibited.

Can i create event/announcement for free?
No, if you wanna have company account and normal account, you must use different emails.
Check if you does\'t used space, or some other whitespaces symbols inside form. If you still have problem, try reset your password or send message on our email!
We are checking reported events/announcements when the report counter hits at least 5 reports. Then we are looking into every message and deciding if this one should be deleted.
Yes, you can create your own event/announcement for free, but probably it is gonna by changed in future. The payment will be depends by how long event/announcement last.
If you need help - send message to us - AhoyApp4u@gmail.com
